description: Adaptive Framework configuration component for type=adaptor. This object type is the parent of an _AdaptiveObjectType_ that contains adaptorType specific properties.

adaptorId.description: A unique identifier for this adaptor instance.
adaptorId.label: Adaptor

adaptorType.description: This specifies the type of adaptor to use. The value of this field must match an adaptorType that is registered by core or by an extension.
adaptorType.label: Adaptor Type

authorizationHandlerId.description: Id of authorization handler used to control access to resources in this adaptor.
authorizationHandlerId.label: Authorization Handler

checkIndividualObjectReadAccess.description: Adaptor requests to get and retrieve objects always do an action 'query' authorization check before any objects are retrieved. If this property is 'true', an additional action 'read' authorization check is made for each individual object. This is useful if the properties of an object are needed to make an authorization decision.
checkIndividualObjectReadAccess.label: Check Individual Object Access

journalAdaptorId.brief: The adaptorId that provides journal service for this adaptor
journalAdaptorId.description: This is the id of an adaptor that provides journal service for this adaptor. This can be this adaptor's own id or a previously defined adaptor's id. If not specified, no journaling will be performed.
journalAdaptorId.label: Journal Adaptor
